resources.string:
Welcome to Smart Heating.

 It seems you have opened this application for the first time.

 To start using the Smart Heating system, please scan the RFID tag on your Raspberry Pi.

 If the scan does not work, please select manual scan from the menu.
Please type the number and letters in the circle into the field below:
To add a new room to your smart heating service, please enter a name for the new room in the field below.
To add a new thermostat to your %1$s, scan the thermostat with your phone.
To set a new target temperature for this room, use the slider on the right.
